analytic.title: The Byzantine and Medieval Periods: Medical Receptions of Phrenitis in Greek, Latin and Semitic Languages (Sixth–Fourteenth Centuries CE)

monogr.title: Phrenitis and the Pathology of the Mind in Western Medical Thought (Fifth Century BCE to Twentieth Century CE)

body.bibl: Thumiger, Chiara. “The Byzantine and Medieval Periods: Medical Receptions of Phrenitis in Greek, Latin and Semitic Languages (Sixth–Fourteenth Centuries CE).” In Phrenitis and the Pathology of the Mind in Western Medical Thought (Fifth Century BCE to Twentieth Century CE), edited by Eadem, 224–86. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2024.
